stepAnswer: To differentiate sales data from Store A in Region $$1$$ from Store A in Region $$2$$
stepBody: Maria is analyzing sales data from multiple stores across different regions. Why would she use SQL to group results by both store and region?
answerLatex: To differentiate sales data from Store A in Region $$1$$ from Store A in Region $$2$$
choices: To sort the results first by region and then by store
To remove the region field from the results
To differentiate sales data from Store A in Region $$1$$ from Store A in Region $$2$$
